content: this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern on my blog www theturtletrunk com the all star ice cream pint cozy works up fast and uses less than 30 yards of yarn this cozy helps keep your hands from freezing when enjoying your pint of ice cream difficulty easy finished size 3 5 x 3 standard us crochet terms instructions include - 1 size cozy - written directions and 3 pages of photo tutorial - link to free video tutorial supplies needed - bernat maker home decrease yarn or medium 4 weight cotton yarn approx 26 yards per cozy - 5 50mm i crochet hook - yarn needle - scissors
